headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Special Discounts: 30% Off Megalodon and 20% Off Whale Cash Cards
content:
For a limited time, get 30% off Megalodon Cash Cards and 20% off Whale Cash Cards.

Launch a smuggling business with a huge selection of discounts this week, including:
- 40% off all Hangars and the Aircraft Workshop
- 40% off the Bombushka, Tula, Pyro, Starling, and more weaponized aircraft from Smugglerâ€™s Run
- 30% off the Grotti Visione and Coil Cyclone Supercars

Offer valid on all Megalodon and Whale Cards purchased until July 30. Visit www.rockstarwarehouse.com
